reasons: Significant outmigration to Visakhapatnam reducing local buyer pool
Cyclone Michaung aftermath depressed real estate activity in coastal mandals
Low industrial investment leading to stagnant land demand
Multiple litigated properties blocking registrations in Palasa and Tekkali zones
suggestedActions: Conduct special registration drives in Narasannapeta and Amadalavalasa mandals
Fast-track denotification of cyclone-affected properties with updated survey records
Coordinate with District Collector to resolve pending Section 22A disputes

reasons: Limited urban growth outside Vizianagaram town resulting in low market values
High proportion of agricultural land transactions with lower stamp duty
Pending RERA registrations causing delays in apartment deed registrations
Shortage of document writers leading to registration backlogs
suggestedActions: Deploy mobile SRO units for remote mandals like Salur and Parvathipuram
Increase market value benchmarks in Vizianagaram urban area to reflect current prices

reasons: Mining belt litigation in Pulivendula and Rajampet mandals blocking transactions
Delayed TIDCO housing allotments reducing new registration volume
Market value revision pending since 2022 causing undervaluation of urban plots
suggestedActions: Expedite market value revision for Kadapa urban and Proddatur mandals
Resolve mining belt property disputes through special Lok Adalat sessions
Appoint additional Sub-Registrar for Proddatur to reduce document processing backlog

reasons: Drought conditions in Penukonda and Dharmavaram mandals depressing agricultural land values
Kia Motors corridor land acquisition disputes pending in revenue courts
Low awareness of online slot booking system in rural mandals leading to walk-in congestion
suggestedActions: Conduct awareness campaigns for Mee-Seva integrated registration services in rural areas
Prioritize resolution of land acquisition compensation disputes near Kia Motors corridor
Increase SRO staffing in Hindupur to handle growing industrial corridor registrations

reasons: Coastal Regulation Zone restrictions limiting development near Vodarevu and Chirala coast
Pending fishermen colony regularization affecting 340+ properties in Ongole mandal
Slow uptake of digital registration services in interior mandals like Markapur and Giddalur
suggestedActions: Coordinate with CRZ authority for expedited NOCs for eligible coastal properties
Establish satellite registration counter in Chirala to serve textile corridor transactions
